htaccess.recommendation: These settings are only applied to the Apache server.

reload.title: WebP
reload.success: The WebP file was created again
reload.error: The WebP file could not be created

update.remove: Don't force WebP for all images

url.title: URL Decorator Service
url.warning: This option should not be used. If this option is still used then it is strongly recommended that this option be disabled while new media is being uploaded.

upgrade.recommendation: Since the generation of the WebP files has been optimized, the recommendation is to delete all WebP files that have already been created using the plugin. Alternatively, the WebP files that have already been created can be adopted.

start.info: Existing WebP files will be discovered.

delete.info: It is worth recreating the WebP files because the generation of the WebP files has been optimized and errors have been fixed.

keep.info: All previously created WebP files are retained and the WebP files do not need to be recreated.

status.end: WebP files have already been transferred.

info.intro: Start upgrade to unlock all new features
info.text: In order to prevent missing WebP links, existing installations were not automatically switched to the newly integrated WebP solution during the update.

success.title: Upgrade successful
success.reload: This page will now be reloaded

upgrade.thanks: Thank you for the helpful tips on improving this plugin. Hopefully this update meets all expectations.

progress.title: Converted Images
progress.alert: Please press the index images button once.

generate.title: Generate images
generate.memory: The server's memory limit was reached while creating [images] images.
generate.time: The server timed out while creating [images] images.
generate.createAll: Create all images in the background

delete.title: Delete all  WebP images
delete.cache: Please empty Shopware-Cache so all changes are visible in the frontend.

settings.info: We recommend not changing the following settings unless you know what you are doing.

activated.title: Reload backend
activated.reload: This page will now be reloaded so that all functions of the Images2WebP ​​plugin are available.

preload.info: Leave field empty if no files are to be preloaded. One file can be defined per line. Specify the absolute path to the file if the file cannot be found in the theme assets.
preload.alert: Adjust this setting for each sales channel if the themes and plugins used differ.
